definition: to reserve a seat/to book a table/reservation
to agree/to conclude/to draw up/to subscribe to (a newspaper etc)/to order
position/location/place/seat/classifier for people (honorific)/classifier for binary bits (e.g. 十六位 16-bit or 2 bytes)/(physics) potential

sentences.english: Great,we’d better make a booking. It’s quite busy this time of a day.
sentences.chinese: 太好了，我们最好先订位，这个时间他们生意都很好。
座位数量有限，订位先到先得。

sentences.english: I want to cancel my reservation to Chicago.
sentences.chinese: 我想取消往芝加哥的订位。

sentences.english: Anyway, we HAs seats to new bookings on the flight. No problem.
sentences.chinese: 别担心，这班班机仍有空位给予新的订位者。

sentences.english: Yes, and we have a reservation under Mr. Brown.
sentences.chinese: 是的，我是布朗先生已订位了。

sentences.english: Your reservation is already in the standby list.
sentences.chinese: 您的订位已经在候补名单了里。

sentences.english: Anyway, we have seats for new bookings on this flight. No problem.
sentences.chinese: 别担心，这班班机仍有空位新的订位者。

sentences.english: Anyway, we get seats to new bookings on that flight. No problem.
sentences.chinese: 别担心，这班班机仍有空位给予新的订位者。

sentences.english: I have to confirm my reservation.
Will I have to reconfirm this reservation?
Anyway we have seats for new bookings on this flight. No problem.
sentences.chinese: 别担墟片这班班机仍有空位提供新荒订位者。

sentences.english: Sir, I need to cancel my reservation for tonight.
sentences.chinese: 先生，我必须取消今晚的订位。

sentences.english: I want to confirm my reservation.
sentences.chinese: 我要确认一下我的订位。

sentences.english: Anyway, we get seats to new bookings on that flight.
sentences.chinese: 别担心，这班班机仍有空位给予新的订位者。

sentences.english: Travel service provider must report genuine ticket number that is valid for travel for an associated PNR.
sentences.chinese: 代理人应提交与旅行订位记录相关的真实有效的票号。

sentences.english: Is there a booking service center around?
sentences.chinese: 附近有订位服务中心吗？

definition: to place an order/to book ahead
(at a restaurant) to order a meal/(of a waiter) to take an order
to sit at a table with others with whom one is unacquainted
to agree/to conclude/to draw up/to subscribe to (a newspaper etc)/to order
to assign sb to a seat/to be allocated a place
to place an order/to book ahead
